cannabisApplyForLicense.socialEquityRequirements: - []{cannabis-social-equity-biz} **For** `Social Equity Business|social-equity-business-cannabis` **Applicants:** A [notarized statement](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/documents/businesses/personal-use/Certification%20of%20SEB%20FINAL%2012.13.21.pdf) by the owner(s) that they meet the eligibility criteria for a SEB and documentation to prove income (such as tax return), residency (such as mortgage statements or bills), and any records related to past cannabis charges, if applicable
cannabisApplyForLicense.impactZoneRequirements: - []{cannabis-impact-zone} **For** `Impact Zone Business|impact-zone-business-cannabis` **Applicants:** Proof that the business meets the eligibility criteria
cannabisApplyForLicense.annualBottomOfTask:
### Application Support

* [Cannabis Application Guide](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/documents/businesses/personal-use/Application%20Guide.pdf)
* [Application Acceptance Criteria and Process](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/documents/businesses/personal-use/Final%20Notice%20of%20Application%20Acceptance.pdf)
* [Cannabis Regulatory Commission Website](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/businesses/index.shtml)

:::callout{ showHeader="true" headerText="Once approved, you will have:" showIcon="true" calloutType="conditional" }

- A Cannabis license number
 - The ability to open your cannabis business

:::
cannabisApplyForLicense.microbusinessRequirements: - []{cannabis-microbusiness} Documentation (provided in your online application) that you and your proposed cannabis business will comply with the `requirements for a microbusinesses|microbusiness-cannabis`
cannabisApplyForLicense.diverselyOwnedRequirements: * \[]{cannabis-dob} **For** `DOB|diversely-owned-business-cannabis` **Applicants:** Copy of Minority or Women-Owned Business Enterprise Certificate or Disabled Veteran Owned Certificate with the New Jersey Department of Treasury
cannabisApplyForLicense.annualGeneralRequirements:
* \[]{general-business-name} Business Name
* []{general-business-reg-cert} A `Business Registration Certificate|business-reg-certificate` 
* []{general-ein} `Employer Identification Number (EIN)|ein` and `NJ Tax ID|tax-id` or Social Security number (if Sole Proprietorship or General Partnership)
* \[]{cannabis-business-local} Proposed location of the cannabis business
* \[]{general-landlord-contact} Name and contact information of the proposed landlord, if applicable
* []{cannabis-poi} Information on all `Persons of Interest (POI)|poi-cannabis` , such as legal name, Social Security number, etc.
* []{cannabis-eoi} Information on all `Entities of Interest (EOI)|eoi-cannabis` , such as legal name, Social Security number, etc.
* \[]{cannabis-entity-disclosure-forms} [Entity Disclosure Forms](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/documents/businesses/personal-use/CRC%20Entity%20Disclosure%20Form%20Fillable.pdf) for you and all EOI
* \[]{cannabis-personal-disclosure-forms} [Personal History Disclosure Forms](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/documents/businesses/personal-use/Personal%20History%20Disclosure%20Form.pdf) for all POI
* []{general-cert-formation} A `Certificate of Formation|certificate-formation` for you and all EOI
* \[]{cannabis-service-contracts} All management services contracts and financial source agreements, whether proposed or executed
* \[]{cannabis-vendor-contracts} Any vendor-contractor agreements if the vendor-contractor qualifies as an EOI
* \[]{cannabis-affidavit} [Completed affidavit](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/documents/businesses/personal-use/Cannabis%20Business%20Applicant%20Affidavit%20Waiver%20Release.pdf) that the statements in the application are true and correct
* \[]{cannabis-authorized-release} [Authorization to release all information](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/documents/businesses/personal-use/Personal%20History%20Disclosure%20Form.pdf) pertaining to the license holder
* \[]{cannabis-liability-waiver} A waiver of liability for any damages to the POI that may result from any disclosure or publication of any information acquired during the licensing process
* \[]{cannabis-site-plan} A site plan of the proposed location, including a floor plan and description of the suitability of the location
* \[]{general-copy-lease}Copy of the lease agreement or letter of intent demonstrating that the applicant will have final site control of the premises upon application approval
* \[]{cannabis-local-codes-compliance} Evidence of location compliance with local codes and ordinances
* \[]{cannabis-zoning-compliance} Zoning approval in the form of a letter or affidavit from your local government that states your location meets zoning requirements, allows for activities related to the operations of your proposed cannabis business, and lists any variances granted 
* \[]{cannabis-local-gov-resolution} Proof of local support stating that you are in compliance with [Section VIII of Notice of Application Acceptance ](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/documents/businesses/personal-use/Final%20Notice%20of%20Application%20Acceptance.pdf) (either a resolution or letter of support from your local government)
* \[]{cannabis-labor peace-agreement} Attestation from a labor organization stating that you both have entered a labor peace agreement *(not required for microbusiness applicants)*
* \[]{cannabis-application-fees} Application fees
cannabisApplyForLicense.applicationPageHelperText: Annual cannabis licenses are reviewed on an ongoing basis. You can apply at any time.
